nodes.text: The United Tribes of Kariek was the political division of the Eickarie on Kariek located in Wild Space near the Unknown Regions, formed by the United Tribes Agreement which ended the fighting between numerous Eickarie tribes, and was governed by the InterTribal Council. Around 22 ABY, the United Tribes Command thwarted the Warlord with military support from the Empire of the Hand.
The "United Tribes of Kariek" borrows the name of some realworld governments including the United States of America and the former United States of Indonesia.
